FAQ

FAQ

Frequently asked questions about ARRAKIS.

General

What is ARRAKIS?

ARRAKIS is a conviction scoring and tiered progression system for token-gated Discord communities. It goes beyond simple balance checks to measure genuine community commitment based on holding duration, trading behavior, and on-chain activity.

How is ARRAKIS different from Collab.Land?

Collab.Land checks: “Does this wallet hold X tokens?”

ARRAKIS asks: “How committed is this holder?” by analyzing holding patterns, accumulation behavior, and on-chain activity to assign conviction scores and granular tiers.

Can I use ARRAKIS alongside Collab.Land?

Yes! Shadow Mode lets you run both simultaneously. ARRAKIS calculates scores and tiers without modifying any roles, so you can compare before switching.

What chains do you support?

All major EVM chains: Ethereum, Polygon, Arbitrum, Optimism, Base, Avalanche, BNB Chain, and more.

What token types are supported?

  • ERC-20 (fungible tokens)
  • ERC-721 (NFTs)
  • ERC-1155 (multi-token)

Pricing

Is there a free tier?

Yes! The Starter plan is free forever and includes:

  • Basic token-gating
  • 3 tiers
  • 5 badges
  • 1 Discord server
  • 24-hour refresh

What’s the Founding 50 offer?

The first 50 premium customers get 50% off Growth plan for life — $49/month instead of $99/month.

Can I try premium features before paying?

Shadow Mode shows conviction data on the free tier. You can see how conviction scoring would work for your community before upgrading.

Technical

How often do roles update?

  • Starter: Every 24 hours
  • Growth: Every 6 hours
  • Enterprise: Every 1 hour

How is conviction calculated?

Conviction combines four factors:

  • Duration (40%): How long tokens have been held
  • Accumulation (25%): Buying patterns, especially during dips
  • Stability (25%): Resistance to selling
  • Activity (10%): On-chain engagement (governance, staking, etc.)

Is my data secure?

Yes. We use PostgreSQL with row-level security (RLS). Each community’s data is isolated. Enterprise plans include full audit trails.

Do you store wallet private keys?

Never. ARRAKIS only stores public wallet addresses and Discord IDs. We read on-chain data — we never have access to private keys or the ability to move funds.

Setup

How long does setup take?

Most communities are live in 15 minutes or less.

Do I need coding skills?

No. ARRAKIS is entirely no-code. The setup wizard guides you through everything.

Can I customize tier names?

Yes. You can rename tiers to match your community’s theme.

Can I create custom badges?

Yes, on Growth and Enterprise plans. Starter plan includes 5 pre-defined badges.

Support

How do I get help?

  • Join our Discord 
  • Email: support@0xhoneyjar.xyz
  • Enterprise: Dedicated Slack channel

What’s your response time?

  • Community Discord: Best effort
  • Email: 24-48 hours
  • Enterprise SLA: 4 hours
